report.title: Species and occurrence counts by site
report.description: Lists locations and the number of species and occurrences within them.
report.query: SELECT l.id, l.name, COUNT(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences, COUNT(DISTINCT ttl.taxon_meaning_id) AS taxa FROM report_websites w JOIN surveys su on su.website_id=w.id JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.website_id=w.id JOIN locations l ON l.id=lw.location_id LEFT JOIN (samples s JOIN occurrences o on o.sample_id=s.id AND o.deleted='f' JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON ttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id ) on s.survey_id=su.id WHERE #website_filter# AND (CAST(su.id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) GROUP BY l.id, l.name #order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
